alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Decatur; Lucas; Mahaska; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 9:45AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Winter Storm For Southeast Iowa This Evening into Thursday... .A wintry mix of light freezing rain, sleet and snow is expected across portions of southern Iowa. The precipitation will transition to all snow late tonight into Thursday morning and continue into tomorrow afternoon. A light glaze of ice is possible later this evening followed by up to a couple of inches of snow. Roads will become slick later this evening into Thursday morning and could impact the morning commute in the affected areas. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 5 1 1 app or dial 5 1 1.
